document_data.name: ''Pot of Awakening''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''pot of awakening''''' was a magical pot that could nurture a plant into sentience.
document_data.Powers: A ''pot of awakening'' looked like a regular clay pot and weighed {{SI|10|lb|k|long=yes}}. If an ordinary shrub was planted in this pot and left to grow for at least 30 days, the shrub was transformed into an [[awakened shrub]]. The awakened shrub woke and left the pot, destroying it in the process as its roots broke through. The awakened shrub was friendly towards the individual who planted it.
